TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {64434=John Parham was bitten by the motorcycle bug early in his life. His enthusiasm led to a partnership in a small motorcycle shop from 1975 to 1979. In 1979 he and his wife, Jill, established J. Parham Enterprises, Inc., the predecessor to the present J&P Cycles. During this time, John still worked full-time and followed his "hobby" in the evening and weekends. Read More, 69791=Copyright © 2015 J&P Cycles Motorsport Aftermarket Group, 60477=— Denny B. // May 15, 2015}
textBeforeTable: Using your right hand, place a tape measure under your palm and measure from the knuckle of your forefinger to the knuckle of your pinkie finger. Note the measurement and compare it to the chart below. General Glove Size Chart Sizing Style: Driving Gloves Sold in Units: Pair Seasonal Wear: Warm Weather Material: Deerskin Leather Manufacturer Part Number: NG815-LRG Gender: Men's Design: Elastic Shirred Wrist Product Specs • Unlined (also available lined with soft fleece lining) • Keeps gloves in place while riding • Comfort fit design with elastic shirred wrist • Soft deerskin driving glove J&P Cycles® Unlined Deerskin Driving Gloves Description Catalogs Reviews Sizing Description
textAfterTable: Customer Reviews Overall Rating: ★★★★★ 5/5 based on 20 ratings Write A Product Review ★★★★☆4 by Elbaker72 Great product, very comfortable warm weather gloves. The first few times I wore them I sweated a little and got some black dye on my hands but nothing major and it hasn't happened since those first few times. You will need something thicker when it gets cold though. ★★★★★5 by kajonshef When I recieved these gloves I was a little worried that they might not be as good as I hoped. Now that they are getting broke in,they are great. Glad I got them.
